items.title: 'I don't know': Trump says of Netanyahu denying Gaza starvation crisis
items.description: The Hamas-run Ministry of Health in the Gaza Strip said in a Monday statement that another 14 people died of malnutrition over the previous 24 hours.

items.title: Heat indices could hit 120 as sweltering temperatures grip eastern US
items.description: More than 185 million people across most of the United States are on alert for widespread, dangerous heat on Monday.

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

items.title: All 3 aboard small plane that crashed in ocean off California died, officials say
items.description: Law enforcement officials say all three people aboard a small twin-engine plane that crashed into the Pacific Ocean off California's central coast hav...

items.title: WATCH:  Passengers exit plane via emergency slide after aborted takeoff
items.description: Passengers evacuated onto the runway via emergency slide after an American Airlines flight aborted its takeoff on the runway in Denver on Saturday.
